name: scholar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 a person who studies a subject in great detail, especially at a university: a classics/history scholar Dr Miles was a distinguished scholar of Russian history.
informal someone who is intelligent or good at learning by studying: David's never been much of a scholar.
More examplesFewer examplesa leading scholar of Islamic economicsa political scholar at the Brookings Institutiona visiting scholar at the University of TokyoMost scholars assert that Christ was born somewhere around this time.The theory has been widely discredited by scholars.
